coreAttributes.name: Warhammer
coreAttributes.description: With a massive head, this hammer is so heavy that it requires two hands and great strength to wield correctly. The head ends are made out of ethereal arcane energy, which instead of smashing someone, drains their energy as it passes through them.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Warhammer from [npc.her] back, ready to draw it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swings)] [npc.her] Warhammer over her shoulder, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] Warhammer at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal head travels through [npc2.her] body!
Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Warhammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal hammer head travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Warhammer, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal head passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Warhammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Warhammer, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
